name: Sheepdogs
description:
Join Max, Dolly and Echo for 20 levels of sheep herding fun!

Features:
  • Single-player pixel-art game perfect for anyone looking for a casual game but still enjoys a challenge.
  • Guide your dog with five simple commands ("come by", "away", "walk on", "lie down" and "that'll do") and herd the sheep in the right direction.
  • Level up to unlock Dolly and Echo.
  • Watch out for those stubborn rams!

Built with GameMaker Studio.
